title: Patch Notes
content: at Atop the Netherbrain in case of modded subclasses. Fixed a bug where killing hostile NPCs in Wyrm's Rock with non-lethal attacks on would be too confusing for them and they'd become unresponsive. Steel Watchers can no longer get Drunk. Fixed newly-spawned Flaming Fists sometimes spawning with just the name 'Fist'. Fixed a missing screen fade when transitioning to the Upper City region on split screen.
